Switch to the full-featured expert mode
Get early access to new patches and manager features
Theme, branding, header, and Shorts options
Changing patch options requires re-patching the app to take effect
Can be a hex color (#RRGGBB) or a color resource reference
Can be a hex color (#RRGGBB) or a color resource reference
Wait until the patch bundle is updated
No options available for this patch

"Folder with images to use as a custom icon.
The folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device: - mipmap-mdpi - mipmap-hdpi - mipmap-xhdpi - mipmap-xxhdpi - mipmap-xxxhdpi
Each of the folders must contain all of the following files: morphe_adaptive_background_custom.png morphe_adaptive_foreground_custom.png
The image dimensions must be as follows: - mipmap-mdpi: 108x108 px - mipmap-hdpi: 162x162 px - mipmap-xhdpi: 216x216 px - mipmap-xxhdpi: 324x324 px - mipmap-xxxhdpi: 432x432 px
Optionally, the path contains a \'drawable\' folder with any of the monochrome icon files: morphe_adaptive_monochrome_custom.xml morphe_notification_icon_custom.xml"

"Folder with images to use as a custom header logo.
The folder must contain one or more of the following folders, depending on the DPI of the device: - drawable-hdpi - drawable-xhdpi - drawable-xxhdpi - drawable-xxxhdpi
Each of the folders must contain all of the following files: morphe_header_custom_light.png morphe_header_custom_dark.png
The image dimensions must be as follows: - drawable-hdpi: 194x72 px - drawable-xhdpi: 258x96 px - drawable-xxhdpi: 387x144 px - drawable-xxxhdpi: 512x192 px"
Remove Shorts from launcher long-press menu
Remove Shorts button from launcher widget
Used to control access to Morphe plugins. Only Morphe has this.
New downloader plugins available. Click here to configure them.
Patching on this device architecture is unsupported and will most likely fail.
Patches could not be loaded. Click to view the error
Patches have not been downloaded. Click here to download
The app installation permission must be granted ahead of time to avoid a bug in the Android 11 system that will negatively affect the user experience.
Use all available downloaders to download the app
Select an APK from local storage
Mounted apps cannot be patched again without root access
Version %s does not match the suggested version
Pick which bundle\'s suggestion should be used when downloading an APK.
Automatically pick the most common compatible version.
Drag the handle to arrange the order bundles appear in the list and the patch selection menu.
A patch bundle with this name already exists
Could not update this patch bundle.
Release page is not available for this bundle
Go to Settings > Advanced > Safeguards and set both \"Require suggested app version\" (toggle off) and \"Disable version compatibility check\" (toggle on) to choose bundle-specific versions.
Your device is not connected to the internet. Downloading will fail later.
You are currently on a metered connection. Data charges from your service provider may apply.
Do you want Morphe to periodically check for updates for the following components?
These settings can be changed later.
Check for updates and view changelog

"A downloader is a plugin which allows URV to download stock APKs from various sources. The downloaded APKs will be shown in the bottom section. During the patching process, you can choose an already downloaded APKs or you can download it via a plugin.
The list of supported downloader plugins can be found"
Check out the latest changes in this update
Tap a color to apply it instantly
Tint surfaces and backgrounds with your own color
Preview of the theme settings above
Pick how the app follows system, light, dark, Material You, or pure black
Do not restrict patches to compatible app versions

"Selecting incompatible patches can result in a broken app.
Do you want to proceed anyways?"
Enforce selection of the suggested app version

"Selecting an app that is not the suggested version may cause unexpected issues.
Do you want to proceed anyways?"
Allow changing patch selection and options
Do not prevent selecting or deselecting patches and customization of options

"Changing the selection of patches may cause unexpected issues.
Enable anyways?"
Do not hide universal patches or prevent the using of them
This patch profile contains universal patches. Enable ‚Äú%1$s‚Äù in advanced settings to use it.
This app contains universal patches. Enable ‚Äú%1$s‚Äù in advanced settings to continue.
You\'ll need enter the keystore\'s credentials to import it.

"You are about to regenerate your keystore the manager will use during the patching process.
You will not be able to update the previously installed apps from this source."
The keystore has been successfully replaced
Import patch selection from a JSON file
Restore remote patch bundles from a JSON file
No new patch bundles were imported
Import saved patch profiles from a JSON file
Restore saved manager settings from a JSON file
Export patch selection to a JSON file
Save imported remote patch bundles to a JSON file
Exported %1$d patch bundles. Some bundles could not be exported because they were added locally.
Export all patch profiles to a JSON file
There are no patch profiles to export
Save all manager settings to a JSON file
All action buttons are hidden, enable at least one in settings
Skip confirmation dialogs for patch selection actions
Disabling confirmations may cause unintended bulk changes.
Automatically hide the patch selection action buttons whenever you select or deselect a patch
Choose the layout order for the patch selection action buttons
Choose which patch selection action buttons are shown
This clears every selected patch across all bundles.
This restores the recommended defaults for %1$s.
This selects every patch across all bundles.

"You are about to reset all patch selections. You will need to manually select each patch again.
Patch profiles are not affected."
This will restore your patch selections and options to their recommended defaults.

"You are about to reset the patch selection for the app \"%s\". You will have to manually select each patch again.
Patch profiles are not affected."
Resets patch selection for a single app

"You are about to reset the patch selection for \"%s\". You will have to manually select each patch again.
Patch profiles are not affected."
Resets the patch selection for a specific collection of patches

"You are about to reset the patch options for the app \"%s\". You will have to reapply each option again.
Patch profiles are not affected."
Resets patch options for a single app

"You are about to reset the patch options for \"%s\". You will have to reapply each option again.
Patch profiles are not affected."
Resets the patch options for a specific collection of patches

"You are about to reset all patch options. You will have to reapply each option again.
Patch profiles are not affected."
Keep APKs downloaded through plugins for reuse. Disable to delete them after patching.
Failed to load. Click for more details
Failed to load "%1$s". You can view the error details or uninstall the plugin.
Are you sure you want to uninstall "%1$s"?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected apps?
Select an APK file from storage using file picker
Speeds up patching by using a separate process
This feature requires Android 11 or greater
Delete native libraries for unsupported CPU architectures from patched apps
The max amount of memory that the Patcher process can use (in megabytes)
Automatically collapse each patcher progress widget after all of its steps finish
The official Morphe patches bundle is currently not installed
The official Morphe patches bundle is currently installed
Failed to restore the Official Morphe patch bundle: %1$s
The Official Morphe patch bundle is already installed
Customize the default filename for exported patched apps
Use the placeholders below to build a filename. The .apk extension is added automatically if missing.
Replaced with the app\'s display name.
Replaced with the app\'s package name.
Replaced with the app\'s version name.
Replaced with the applied patch bundle version(s).
Replaced with the applied patch bundle name(s).
The API used to download necessary files
Change the API URL of Morphe. Morphe uses the API to download patches and updates.
Morphe connects to the API to download patches and updates. Make sure that you trust it.
GitHub Personal Access Token needed for GitHub integration
Set a GitHub Personal Access Token in order to be able to add Pull Requests as external sources. Create a PAT with scope public_repo
Adds this PAT to exported manager settings
Do not share your PAT. If you include it in a settings export, keep that file private because it contains the token.
No patches can be found. Check your patches
Remove the selected apps from the manager? Installed apps on your device will stay untouched.
Patch selection and options has been reset to recommended defaults

"The version of the app you have selected does not match the suggested version. Please use the suggested version: %s
To continue anyway, disable \"Require suggested app version\" in the advanced settings."

"It is recommended to use the default patch selection and options. Changing them may result in unexpected issues.
You need to turn on \"Allow changing patch selection and options\" in the advanced settings before toggling patches."
Choose the patch bundles to include in this profile.
No patch bundles are available to save.
Enter a name for this patch profile or select one below to update it
Tap a saved profile to overwrite it, or leave everything unselected to create a new profile.
Patch profile "%1$s" already exists for this app
Set a specific app version to store with this profile, or target all versions.
"Current version: %1$s Incoming version: %2$s Which should be saved to this profile?"
Save a configuration from the patch selection screen to see it here.
Some bundles in this profile are not available and will be skipped.
Some patches or options in this profile no longer match the bundle and were skipped.
No bundles in this profile are available. Update your bundles and try again.
Could not open this patch profile.
No local patch bundle found with UID %1$d.
The patcher ran out of memory
The experimental patcher process stopped because it ran out of memory. We lowered its memory limit from %1$d MB to %2$d MB so you can try again immediately.

The experimental patcher process stopped because it ran out of memory, but the memory limit is already at %1$d MB. Try lowering it further in Advanced settings or disable the experimental mode before retrying.
"The following patches aren\'t available in the current bundle: %1$s You can remove them automatically, adjust the selection, or continue anyway."
"These patches need to be reselected: %1$s Enable them again (or pick alternatives) and then try patching once more."

"This patch is not compatible with the selected app version (%1$s).
It is only compatible with the following version: %2$s."
No patches recorded for this app
Bundle metadata unavailable. Showing saved patch names.
No patch bundles recorded for this app
Do you want to unmount the app?
Are you sure you want to unpatch this app?
Downloader did not find the app
There are downloaders installed but none are trusted. Check your settings.
Mounts the patched APK over the installed app (root required).
Install silently using Shizuku or Sui.
Install Shizuku or Sui to use this option.
Start Shizuku or Sui and try again.
Grant Shizuku permission to Morphe from the Shizuku app.
Your primary installer is set to the rooted mount installer. This saved app was not installed using mount.
Your primary installer is set to the rooted mount installer. This saved app was not installed using mount.
Your primary installer is set to the rooted mount installer. This saved app was not installed using mount.
This app was installed using the rooted mount installer. Switch your primary installer back to use mount actions, then mount.
This app was installed using the rooted mount installer. Switch your primary installer back to use mount actions, then remount.
This app was installed using the rooted mount installer. Switch your primary installer back to use mount actions, then unmount.
Stock app version (%2$s) does not match patched app version (%1$s). Mount the matching stock version, then try again.
The installed Shizuku version is not supported.
Unable to open Shizuku. Launch it manually and try again.
Installers manually added by the user to the Primary & Fallback installer selection menus.
Installers automatically detected and added to the Primary & Fallback installer selection menus.
Save third-party installer activities for use as primary or fallback installers
Type a package name and tap \"Find installers\" to discover installer activities
Could not remove the installer. Try again.
The installation failed. Try again or switch to a different installer.
The installation was blocked by Android. Check Play Protect or security settings.
Another app with this package name is already installed. Uninstall it before continuing.
The APK is not compatible with this device or Android version.
The APK is invalid or corrupted.
There is not enough storage space for the installation.
The installation timed out. Try again.
%1$s did not confirm the installation. Check the other app and try again.
%1$s finished without installing the app. Check the installer for an error message and try again.
Missing original APK for mount install.
Rooted mount installer does not support split APKs. Use system installer instead.
Installation did not finish. Check the system installer dialog and try again.
Uninstallation did not finish. Check the uninstall dialog and try again.
This will remove the saved app entry and its stored APK.
This will remove the saved app entry and its saved APK. The app will remain installed.
Install the app before opening it.
This removes the installed version only. Your saved APK stays intact.
User interaction is required in order to proceed with this plugin.
Tap to return to the patcher
Are you sure you want to stop the patching process?
Installation is in progress. Please wait
Mount is in progress. Please wait
You are about to leave the patcher. The patched app will be lost unless you save it for later.
Keeps the patched APK accessible from the Apps tab for future installation.
Discards the patched APK and returns you to the previous screen.
Are you sure you want to delete \"%s\"?
Are you sure you want to delete the selected patch bundles?

"Morphe is an experimental open-source project focused on creating a modern, streamlined patching of popular Android apps
Open-source at its core, Morphe thrives on community feedback and contributions to drive future innovation"
Allow patch and manager updates over metered networks
Check for new versions of Morphe when the application starts
Battery optimizations must be turned off in order for Morphe to work correctly in the background. Click here to turn off optimizations.
A new version of Morphe (%s) is available.

"You are currently on a metered connection, and data charges from your service provider may apply.
Do you still want to continue?"
Add new patch bundles from URL or local files
Add patch bundles from local storage.
Add patch bundles from URL. Patch bundles can automatically update.
The installation failed due to an unknown reason. Try again?
The installation was cancelled manually. Try again?
The installation was blocked. Review your device security settings and try again.
The installation was prevented by an existing installation of the app. Uninstall the installed app and try again?
The installed app is signed differently. Uninstall the installed app and install this one?
The app is incompatible with this device. Use an APK that is compatible by this device and try again.
The app is invalid. Uninstall the app and try again?
The app could not be installed due to insufficient storage. Free up some space and try again.
The installation took too long. Try again?
Automatically update when a new version is available

"These patches are not compatible with the selected app version (%1$s).
Click on the patches to see more details."
Show a popup notification whenever a new update is available on launch
